column4: When i put in the cd and boot from it, i puch install.. the cd packes out the files, and after that.. its just black screen, and nothing more. what sould i do? :s
When i put in the cd and boot from it, i puch install.. the cd packes out the files, and after that.. its just black screen, and nothing more. what sould i do? :s
you get to grub menu "install or start" and when sellected it hangs.. have you done the cd self test ?
down three lines on the std disk
memory test? ;p
Assuming the test is ok you can hit F6 and try some of these options  Grub Boot Options ide=nodma vga=normal nomce acpi=off pnpbios=off xdrvr=vesa xres=800x600 apm=off quiet
all at once?
IS this a desktop or lappy
One other thing might be to set bios from usb2.0 to usb1.1
afterwords then?
I am just giving you some things to try with difficult hardware..
Do you have any usb 2.0 devices plugged in?
razer
What is razer?   Pull it off to try
ide=nodma -> blacksrc with much wrintings :P
kernel panic
Did the self test pass.. all of it..
The only option I have to offer are the ones I gave you...  Did you unplug your razer
did you try setting bios usb to 1.1, did you try all the different grub options..
ill try the pure installation without any usb's inside :P
good luck.. one of those will almost always work
